about_the_game:
Arisen Force: HeroTest is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels ,it combines the engaging Stylish Actional combat experience.
Players travel to the Time Temple, summon heroes across time and space, and challenge the magic tower to save the heroic spirits and goddesses!

Join the exquisite-definition pixel style world "HeroTest", and experience an exhilarating, stylized combat journey with heroes from temporal rift to fight against the dark erosion of the void.

Features

  • Embark on a Time-Traveling Quest: Gather legendary heroes from diverse eras to combat a mysterious void invasion. Delve into the secrets hidden within the mystical Temples of Time and enchanted towers.

  • Dynamic Team Combat: Engage in thrilling battles alongside your allies, leveraging an extensive arsenal of weapon mods, items, and talents to outsmart your foes.

  • Exhilarating Action: Experience high-octane, stylized action designed for maximum enjoyment and tactical depth..

  • Seamless Blend of Old and New: Encounter a unique mix of classic gameplay elements and modern design, featuring challenging adversaries and ingenious level architecture.,

  • Immersive Battle Environments: Journey through each hero’s distinct thematic setting, enjoying diverse and visually stunning combat scenarios.

Procedure

In a fictional time-space setting, players are summoned by a goddess to the Temple of Time to harness powers beyond this world and repel the Void's invasion. The Temple of Time serves as the last bastion and the player's base after each mission. From this sanctuary, players journey to various time-spaces corrupted by the Void, taking on the roles of heroes to rescue them and bring them back to the temple. Together, they march towards the Void-corrupted Demon Tower. In the Temple of Time, players can strategize, assemble their teams, and prepare for battle before embarking on their quests.

Heroes

In the main storyline, players will randomly encounter six legendary hero characters through the time teleportation roulette. They are: King Arthur (Greatsword), Catherine(Firearm), Jeanne (Lance), Guan Yu (Polearm), Hippolyta (Bow), and Oda Nobunaga (Katana).

Since each hero has unique talents and areas of expertise, and weapons and skills are independent, players can achieve astonishing synergy by experimenting with different weapon and skill combinations. Under certain conditions, skill points can be reallocated, unlocking even more possibilities and enjoyment.

Worlds

We have introduced a new dynamic time pass system with four distinct time periods. Combined with our high-definition, beautifully crafted pixel-style 3D environments and special effects, this offers a visual experience that blends nostalgia with modern aesthetics, providing ultimate visual enjoyment as the scenery evolves.
